noun.definition: The feel, appearance, or consistency of a surface or substance
noun.example: The fabric has a soft texture.

noun.definition: The visual or tactile quality in art, music, or literature
noun.example: The painting has a rich texture.

verb.definition: To give a particular surface quality or pattern to something
verb.example: The artist textured the canvas using different brushes.

usage_examples: The chef added spices to texture the dish.
